cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 1135 miles east of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to continue west-northwest for the next 2-3 days, then bend northwest keeping the center north of the Leeward Islands and Puerto Rico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: None – currently expected to remain over the Atlantic north of the Leeward Islands

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands (Antigua, Barbuda, St. Kitts/Nevis) and open Atlantic waters north of those islands
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤7%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds late Sunday; occasional gusts possible in outer rain bands
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; storm passage stays well north of Puerto Rico
weather_observation.rainfall: Minimal; only light showers from distant outer bands expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would significantly disrupt port operations
